body.description: Redmi 12 Large 90Hz FHD+ display Premium glass back design 90Hz 6.79” FHD+ display SGS Low Blue Light Certification Exquisite glass design Premium, slimmer Measuring just 8.17mm thin, Redmi 12 brings an all-new meaning to looking and feeling good with its stylish and durable glass back design. Infinite camera deco design, open up your imagination With seamlessly integrated cameras and a premium glass back, Redmi 12 truly stands out from the competition. 6.79" FHD+ DotDisplay A shockingly large field of vision Enjoy life with a big screen thanks to Redmi 12's immersive and smooth 90Hz 6.79" FHD+ display, perfect for everything from watching videos to browsing social media. A better, safer experience for your eyes With both SGS Low Blue Light Certification and Reading mode 3.0, Redmi 12 helps you enjoy n 90Hz AdaptiveSync refresh rate Smooth experience at all times Redmi 12 feels super smooth and satisfying to use, whether you're a gamer, a social media star, or just enjoy having a fast and snappy experience. And, thanks to AdaptiveSync, Redmi 12 will automatically optimize its refresh rate for whatever you're doing. 1217 loud speaker Experience a surge in immersive sound Large 5000mAh(typ) battery Extra long battery life for peace of mind The 5000mAh super power along with the 18W fast charge, ensuring a longer use and faster charge and helping you get rid of power anxiety. MediaTek Helio G88 Octa-core processor, bringing a smoother experience Bigger, better memory Do more, watch more, enjoy more Redmi 12 comes with a maximum capacity of 256GB, standing out from the competition. And with up to 1TB of expandable storage, Redmi 12 makes it easy to keep all the photos, videos, and files you need with you, wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent phone at excellent price
reviews.reviewText: The Xiaomi Redmi 12 4g is definitely among the bet buys I have ever made in my entire life. As a senior professional engine I can say with great confidence that this cell phone is great in both design and manufacturing. Just watch on YouTube the 9.3 B$ Xiaomi fully automated plant in China and you will see the highest cell phone manufacturing facility on the plant. The performance of this phone is suburb in every function. Speed, camera shots, communicating with the web just to name some. People who judge the Redmi 12 camera pictures as lagging sharpness are not fair in their judgment. Photos taken by any cell phones are 5% optical and 95% digital simulation and these are not the same as photos shot be a camera with 35 mm lenses, I am not sure what a 1000$ or more flag phone would do more that the Redmi 12. This phone is excellent and its price is absolutely great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Vamos lá,já estou com o produto a 1 mês,e realmente,foi um ótimo produto,quando comprei estava 1300,agora está apenas 1000,mas ainda assim,o produto é muito bom,as coisas notáveis e boas a destacar são,A boa memória,boa quantidade de memória RAM,8gb e 5gb usável para games, e com possibilidade de expandir nas configurações,podendo pegar memória interna e converter em RAM,da pra converter até 8gb a mais,totalizando 16,bateria boa,não tem muito do que se falar,boa e padrão pro custo,câmera boa também,digital boa certinho funcionando,veio bem embalado,e já veio com uma capinha transparente com proteção da entrada de carregamento e uma película provisória,o que é muito bom,porém a única coisa que eu não gostei é esse processador,ele da conta do recado,porém né,é Midiatek,se fosse snapdragon seria perfeito,mas esse hélio g88 que tem no celular esquenta fácil com qualquer coisa,mexendo casualmente no celular ele já começa a esquentar notávelmente,é pouco,mas notável,jogando ou usando no carregador ele esquenta bastante,e isso é a única coisa que achei ruim,carregando sem mexer também esquenta bastante então desliguem o wi-fi quando botar pra carregar,pra jogar ou fazer serviços pesados que exigem grande funcionamento,usem em local frio ou com ventilador por perto,recomendo,mas mesmo assim é um ótimo custo benefício e pra mim valeu muito cada centavo,pra mim que passei de um tijolo que era o A20 que dei 1400 na época tá ótimo,super recomendo
Arrived very quick and working great so far.
Muy bien dispositivo móvil la verdad cumple con lo que promete, es fácil de usar aparte de estar padre el diseño quedó contento con el producto ya que por eso compré uno más
Es un buen teléfono, una opción adecuada si buscas algo económico y fácil de usar.
Tamanho e desempenho, e bonito, e muita memória, e custo benefício, e recomendo.
